title: Disobedience
overview: Luca Manzi is a fourteen year old boy when the Northern Italy Republic of Sal√≤ is governed by the Fascists. He becomes a partisan but when the war ends he is disappointed because things have not changed as he had hoped they wood, and he decides to let himself die.
